title: Hyderabad: GO 69 issued to remove restrictions of GO 111 - Telangana Today
content:
1. Hyderabad: GO 69 issued to remove restrictions of GO 111  Telangana Today
  2. Telangana govt introduces G.O 69  The Hans India
  3. Telangana issues new GO, paves way for heavy construction in 84 villages  BusinessLine
  4. Telangana: Lifting GO 111 will cause huge loss, say experts  Times of India
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Hyderabad: The State government on Wednesday issued the GO Ms No.69, removing certain restrictions that were imposed under GO Ms 111 in 1996, to protect the catchment area of the Osman Sagar and Himayat Sagar reservoirs, which were the main source of drinking water to Hyderabad at that time. The order said considering the fact [â€¦]
